sistemas_especiales_hero_subtitle: Devices for sanitization of air, surfaces and liquids without chemicals
sistemas_especiales_description: CADIPEL developed FRESH-AIR-UVC, a technology based on LED UV-C with controlled emission (switching mode) to reduce microbial load in indoor environments. It integrates into mobile and fixed devices, with safety criteria for operation in real environments.
sistemas_especiales_problem_1: Poorly ventilated environments or high people turnover
sistemas_especiales_problem_2: Need for continuous sanitization without interrupting operation
sistemas_especiales_problem_3: Limitations of chemical use (residues, times, costs, contact with surfaces)
sistemas_especiales_problem_4: Operational risk in small spaces (elevators, waiting rooms, corridors)
sistemas_especiales_solution_item_1: LED UV-C in switching mode (controlled emission for safer use)
sistemas_especiales_solution_item_2: Mobile devices for point-of-use (tables, counters, reduced spaces)
sistemas_especiales_solution_item_3: Fixed devices for common areas (ceiling installation/strategic points)
sistemas_especiales_solution_item_4: Presence sensors / work modes (automatic: maximum power without people, safe mode with presence)
sistemas_especiales_applications_item_1:
Personal mobile device
For localized sanitization in proximity (service points, tables, workstations). Focused on individual or small group use.
sistemas_especiales_applications_item_2:
Fixed device for common areas
Designed for concentration spaces and low ventilation (e.g.: elevators, small rooms, accesses). Operates with presence automation.
sistemas_especiales_benefits_item_2: No chemicals (no residues or product handling)
sistemas_especiales_benefits_item_3:
Automation and control by sensors and operation
modes
sistemas_especiales_benefits_item_4: Improvement of environmental hygiene at critical points
sistemas_especiales_technologies_item_4:
Power electronics and firmware
(emission control / switching)
sistemas_especiales_cta_item_1: Design and manufacturing of sanitizing devices
sistemas_especiales_cta_item_2: R&D and validation with academic partners / laboratories
sistemas_especiales_cta_item_3:
Integration in real environments
(survey, installation and commissioning)
sistemas_especiales_cta_item_4: Safe use protocols and operational recommendations
sistemas_especiales_security_note_text: Effectiveness depends on environmental conditions (volume, ventilation, exposure time, equipment location and operation). It is not possible to guarantee 100% elimination in uncontrolled environments. Use in accordance with installation and safety recommendations is required.
